Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 9 Guo and co-workers used a number of fused thiophene spacers to tune the aggregation behavior of difluorobenzoxadiazole (ffBX)-based donor polymers among which PffBX-TT with thieno[3,2-b]thiophene as a spacer showed intermediate temperature - dependent aggregation strength allowing the control of blend film morphology during PSC fabrication.

Let's think step by step.

| difluorobenzoxadiazole (ffBX)-based donor polymers |
| PffBX-TT |
| thieno[3,2-b]thiophene |
| blend film morphology |
| PSC fabrication |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 9 Guo and co-workers used a number of fused thiophene spacers to tune the aggregation behavior of difluorobenzoxadiazole (ffBX)-based donor polymers among which PffBX-TT with thieno[3,2-b]thiophene as a spacer showed intermediate temperature - dependent aggregation strength allowing the control of blend film morphology during PSC fabrication.

Let's think step by step.

Here are the "Property Value" entities identified in the paragraph, presented as a Markdown table:

| Property Value |
| --- |
| a number of fused thiophene spacers |
| intermediate temperature - dependent aggregation strength |
| thieno[3,2-b]thiophene |
| blend film morphology |
| PSC fabrication |

Note that "ffBX-TT" is not included in the table because it is not a "Property Value" entity. It is a compound name, consisting of "ffBX" and "TT", which are themselves abbreviations for "difluorobenzoxadiazole" and "thieno[3,2-b]thiophene", respectively.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

After reviewing the entities identified in the previous answer, I have determined that only one entity, "intermediate temperature - dependent aggregation strength", clearly refers to a value of a material property. Here is the updated Markdown table:

| Property Value |
| --- |
| intermediate temperature - dependent aggregation strength |

The other entities identified in the previous answer, such as "a number of fused thiophene spacers" and "thieno[3,2-b]thiophene", are not values of material properties, but rather describe the materials themselves or their structure. The entities "blend film morphology" and "PSC fabrication" are not values of material properties either, but rather describe the processes or outcomes of processing the materials.
